p-S2,S5-POLR2A
Comment: The C-terminal domain (CTD) of POLR2A contains about 52 repeats of the consensus heptad YSPTSPS. Serines-2 and 5 of the heptads are phosphorylated in RNA polymerase II initiating transcription of protein coding genes. The exact repeats that are phosphorylated are not known.
